paragraphs.text:
/* Read Training data using spark-csv */

val df = sqlContext.read
    .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")
    .option("header", "true") // Use first line of all files as header
    .option("inferSchema", "true") // Automatically infer data types //.option("quote", "\"")
    .option("mode", "DROPMALFORMED")
    .load("file:///Users/vaishalilambe/Downloads/train_ver2.csv")

/* Print columns of the dataframe */
df.columns.map(c => println(c))

paragraphs.text:
/* Find total number of records of a dataframe */
val rows = df.count()

val newNames = Seq("Partitioned_Date","Cust_Code","Emp_Index", "Cust_Residence", "Cust_Gender", "Cust_Age", "First_Holder_Date", "New_Cust_Index", "Cust_Seniority",
    "Cust_Index_Primary", "Last_Date_Primary_Cust","Cust_Type","Cust_Relation_Type","Residence_Index","Foreigner_Index", "Spouse_Index", "Channel", "Deceased_Index", "Addres_Type",
    "Province_Code", "Province_Name", "Activity_Index","Gross_Income","Cust_Identification", "Saving_Acc", "Guarantees","Current_Acc","Derivada_Acc", "Payroll_Acc", "Junior_Acc", 
    "Mas_Acc","Particular_Acc", "Particular_Plus_Acc","Short_Term_Deposit", "Medium_Term_Deposits","Long_Term_Deposits","e_Acc", "Funds", "Mortgage","Pensions","Loans","Taxes",
    "Credit_Card","Securities","Home_Acc", "Payroll", "Nom_Pensions","Direct_Debit" )
val dfRenamed = df.toDF(newNames: _*)

/* Dataframe as table */    
dfRenamed.registerTempTable("sbank")

paragraphs.text:
/* Write new dataframe with changed column names into .csv"*/
dfRenamed.coalesce(1).
    write.
    format("com.databricks.spark.csv").
    option("header", "true").
    save("file:///Users/vaishalilambe/Downloads/new_train_ver2.csv")
%spark import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils

%spark.sql
select count(Cust_Gender),Cust_Gender
from sbank
--where Cust_Gender IS NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender

%spark.sql
select count(Last_Date_Primary_Cust), Last_Date_Primary_Cust
from sbank
group by Last_Date_Primary_Cust
order by Last_Date_Primary_Cust asc

%spark.sql
select count(Cust_Identification), Cust_Identification 
from sbank
group by Cust_Identification

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
select count(Cust_Type),Cust_Type
from sbank
group by Cust_Type

%spark.sql
select avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income,  Cust_Identification 
from sbank
where Cust_Identification  is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income, Cust_Gender
from sbank
where Cust_Gender IS NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender

%spark.sql
select count(Cust_Gender) as Count_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Count_Cust_Identification, Cust_Gender, Cust_Identification
from sbank
where Cust_Gender IS NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification IS NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender, Cust_Identification

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
select count(Saving_Acc) as Num_Saving_Acc, count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Saving_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification
Order by Num_Saving_Acc desc

%spark.sql
select count(Guarantees) as Num_Guarantees,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Saving_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification
order by Num_Guarantees desc

%spark.sql
select count(Current_Acc) as Num_Current_Accounts,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Saving_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification
order by Num_Current_Accounts desc

%spark.sql
select count(Derivada_Acc) as Num_Derivada_Account,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Saving_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification
order by Num_Derivada_Account desc

%spark.sql
select count(Payroll_Acc) as Num_Payroll_Acc,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender,count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Payroll_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification
order by Num_Payroll_Acc desc

%spark.sql
select count(Junior_Acc) as Num_Junior_Acc,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender,count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Payroll_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Mas_Acc) as Num_Mas_Acc,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender,count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Payroll_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Particular_Acc) as Num_Particular_Acc,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender,count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification,Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Particular_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

paragraphs.text:
%spark.sql
select count(Particular_Plus_Acc) as Num_Particular_Plus_Acc,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Particular_Plus_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Short_Term_Deposit) as Num_Short_Term_Deposit,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Short_Term_Deposit is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Medium_Term_Deposits) as Num_Medium_Term_Deposit,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Medium_Term_Deposits is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Long_Term_Deposits) as Num_Long_Term_Deposit,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Long_Term_Deposits is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(e_Acc) as Num_e_Acc,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender, count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where e_Acc is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Funds) as Num_Funds,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Funds is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Mortgage) as Num_Mortgage,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Mortgage is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
select count(Pensions) as Num_Pensions,count(Cust_Gender) as Num_Gender,Cust_Gender, count(Cust_Identification) as Num_Cust_Identification, Cust_Identification,avg(Gross_Income) as Avg_Gross_Income
from sbank
where Pensions is NOT NULL
and Gross_Income is NOT NULL
and Cust_Gender is NOT NULL
and Cust_Identification is NOT NULL
group by Cust_Gender,Cust_Identification

%spark.sql
Select Province_Name, count(Cust_Code) 
from sbank 
where Cust_Code IS NOT NULL 
and Province_Name is Not NULL
group by Province_Name  
Order by count(Cust_Code) desc
